alex: So, have you finally texted her?
cz_reply: Jo, napsal jsem jí dnes ráno.
accepted_answers: Yeah, I’ve texted her this morning.
I have sent her a message this morning.

cz_reply: Odpověděla mi velmi slušně a zdvořile.
accepted_answers: She has replied very politely.
She replied really politely.

alex: Sounds formal. Are you sure you texted the right person?
cz_reply: Podíval jsem se na jméno a bylo tam Jana Nováková.
accepted_answers: I’ve checked the name and it was Jana Nováková.
I checked the name – it was Jana Nováková.

alex: Wait… isn’t that our teacher’s name?
cz_reply: Eh... jo, to je asi ona.
accepted_answers: Uh... yeah, I guess it’s her.
Yeah... that’s probably her.

alex: Dude! Have you been flirting with the teacher?
cz_reply: Napsal jsem jí, že má krásné oči.
accepted_answers: I’ve told her she has beautiful eyes.
I told her she’s got beautiful eyes.

cz_reply: Napsala, že je ráda, že si toho někdo všiml.
accepted_answers: She said she’s glad someone noticed.
She has written that she’s happy someone noticed.

alex: Wait what?! She didn’t get angry?
cz_reply: Ne, byla fakt milá. Dokonce se mě ptala, jestli jsem volný o víkendu.
accepted_answers: No, she was really nice. She asked me if I’m free this weekend.
She has asked if I am free this weekend.

alex: No way! Are you going out with your teacher?
cz_reply: Řekla, že bychom si mohli dát kafe a popovídat si.
accepted_answers: She said we could grab a coffee and talk.
She has said we can go for coffee and chat.

alex: I can’t believe this is happening. Have you told anyone else?
accepted_answers: No, just you for now.
I haven’t told anyone else.

alex: This is wild. Have you met her outside of school before?
cz_reply: Ne, ale napsala mi, že mě často vídá na náměstí.
accepted_answers: No, but she wrote that she often sees me at the square.
She has told me she often sees me at the square.

alex: That’s lowkey romantic. Has she said anything else?
cz_reply: Řekla, že jsem jiný než ostatní studenti.
accepted_answers: She said I’m different from other students.
She has said I’m not like other students.

alex: Well… this took a turn. Do you like her?
cz_reply: Jo, je chytrá, milá a vtipná.
accepted_answers: Yeah, she’s smart, kind and funny.
Yes, she is clever, nice and funny.

alex: Bro... this might be your first real love story.
cz_reply: Možná… všechno začalo jednou špatnou zprávou.
accepted_answers: Maybe… it all started with one wrong message.
It all began with a mistaken text.

alex: That’s life, man. Have you planned the coffee date?
cz_reply: Jo, potkáme se v sobotu v kavárně u řeky.
accepted_answers: Yeah, we’ll meet on Saturday at the café by the river.
We are meeting on Saturday at the river café.

alex: Good luck, Romeo. Let me know how it goes!
cz_reply: Určitě! Dám ti vědět po schůzce.
accepted_answers: Definitely! I’ll let you know after the date.
